header: Over 3.5 Crore to take holy dip
article:
AP CM N Chandrababu Naidu will officially inaugurate the Krishna Pushkaralu on Friday morning at the Durga Ghat in Vijayawada.

In all, 170 bathing ghats have been readied in Kurnool, Guntur and Krishna districts for the Pushkaralu.

Telangana CM K Chandrashekar Rao to launch Krishna Pushkaralu at Jogulamba temple at Alampur in Mahabubnagar district. The Chief Minister will leave for Jogulamba on August 11 and stay put for the night. On August 12, KCR will perform special prayers in Jogulamba temple in the early hours. He will take bath at Gondimalla Pushkar Ghat, 10 km away from Jogulamba temple, amidst Vedic chantings.
